page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: The crops grown in our block are wheat, barley, corn,potatoes,sugar beet, peas and oil seed rape. The land is very good for growing crops, irrigation water is pumped from the river by tractor driven pumps. The hedges have been pulled up making room for more modern machinery. Nitram, Tillage, pot ash and lime are the fertilizers used for making crops grow better and produce more per acre. A new crop called linseed oil which some farmers are thinking of growing next year The animals around here are mostly bullocks,sheep and pigs,and for eggs chickens are kept. Horses are kept to get money by entering competitions. Mark Fryer.
